dcterms:description: A dataset containing labeled threads from Twitter and Reddit where each source post mentions a rumor. Subtask A involves classifying each reply post into support, deny, query, or comment. Subtask B involves predicting the veracity of the rumor as true, false, or unverified.
dcterms:title: RumourEval 2019
